page.title: 18Education
page.content: There is only one{school}in Kenninghall and this caters from the 5 year old to the 11year old. There are about 73 pupils at present and 3 members of staff.{Pre-school}ages are catered for by the Mother and Toddler club, this caters for the 2 to 4 year olds.The 4to 5 year olds are catered for by{Play School.} After the children have finished their Junior education they are then transferred to the local{secondary} school at Old Buckenham which is about 6 miles away.If parents do not wish to send their children to this school then they can send them to the Private schools in the area. There is a{Special}school at Attleborough, which is about 7 miles away, to deal with those children who have special needs.Transport is provided for all these children.
